content: if to knit and slip the stitch off the needle bring threaded needle through next stitch on fn as if to purl and leave stitch on needle 4 bring threaded needle through first st on bn as if to purl and slip this st off bring needle through next st on bn as if to knit and leave this stitch on the needle repeat 3 and 4 until no stitches remain on the needles copyright2010 christiane burkhard you may use this pattern for personal non-profit or charity use only www lismiknits blogspot com 8
